amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to restore funding to the National Agricultural Statistical Service to FY19 levels and directs the difference to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the National Agricultural Statistical Service by $12,996,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 307 (Roll no. 409).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 307 (Roll no. 409).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
